content:
Swing festival in Darmstadt with a special focus on switching.
B.T. Switch is our new festival that’s all about - you guessed it - switching and ambidancing. Get ready for a three-day deep dive into the blurry line between leading and following, backed up by three parties with live music to satisfy your swing cravings. As with every year, we have an overarching theme for the festival: this time, we look forward to diving into different ‚ÄòRhythms & Grooves‚Äô.
The workshops will be held in four different levels, so that you can join regardless of whether you have danced the other role before or not. There will be six hours of dedicated switch/BiRol/ambidance content per level, one hour of bonus concept content that plays into the theme, plus an additional two open-level class slots and a community talk.
Address: Various locations in Darmstadt Cost: depending on the classes chosen (registration closed on November 2, 2025), party passes might be available still. Time: Friday (6 March until Sunday 8 March)
title: B.T.Switch

content:
This workshop, focused on solo dancing to jazz music, offers a unique blend of classes and practice time that help you see real progress right away.
During the classes, Kris will share her latest understanding of the dance to spark new ideas. Then, in the practice sessions, she‚Äôll provide the time and support you need to incorporate these insights into your dancing and allow you to develop your own unique style.
Link to the Workshop Address: Kurf√ºrsten-Anlage 58, 69115 Heidelberg Cost: 100‚Ç¨, 70‚Ç¨ if you have a regular Full Pass at SwingStep Time: November 22 and November 23, 2025, the times are for each day Start: 2:00 p.m. End: 5:30 p.m.
title: 'Boost Your Solo' Workshop
